Data: New Zealand have won the toss and elected to bat first. Brendon McCullum will open the batting and keep wicket, Cumming comes into the NZ side for Jeetan Patel while the Australian team is unchanged.
Bracken to McCullum, no run nudges it out to Hussey
Bracken to McCullum, no run Just outside the off stump. Guptill pushes it back and Bracken fields in his follow through
Bracken to McCullum, no run Fires in a quicker ball, defended to leg side
Bracken to McCullum, 3 runs flicked to backward square leg. Hilfenhaus misfields and the batsmen manage three out of what should have been a dot ball
Bracken to Guptill, no run leaves a lifting ball outside off stump
Bracken to Guptill, no run Slower ball angled across the batsman. Defends on the offside
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 1 run
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run Shorter ball, defends awkwardly
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run angled down leg turned off the hip.
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run Squared up and defended on offside
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run nudged to mid on
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, 1 run Guptil gets on the back foot and pushes into the covers. Hopes slides across put they're through for a quick single
Bracken to Guptill, no run Guided to backward point, no run there
Bracken to Guptill, no run pushes wide of off stump. No shot offered
Bracken to Guptill, no run pushed wide of off stump again
Bracken to Guptill, no run pushed to point. David Hussey rushes in to field
Bracken to Guptill, 2 runs rocks onto the back foot and drives through the covers. Clarke has to work hard to chase the ball down before the boundary
Bracken to Guptill, no run Drives at the ball and fielded at forward point
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 2 runs Charges and plays backward of pint. flicked to the stumps and they take an overthrow
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 1 run edged to third man
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run defended a rising ball into covers
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run driven to mid on
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run cross bat smash to point
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run attempts to flick it down to backward square leg but can't get the ball away
Bracken to McCullum, no run Turned off the but this time fielded cleanly at backward square leg
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run On the front foot, pushed into the covers where Mike Hussey fields
Bracken to Guptill, no run Leaves one outside off stump angled across him
Bracken to Guptill, no run Full delivery and drives. Bracken jumps high to field in his follow through
Bracken to Guptill, no run Pitched up and square drives. Ponting does well to cut it off and fires it back at Haddin who does some acrobatics with the return
Bracken to Guptill, no run Gets forward and defends
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run On the backfoot and angled to Ponting at point
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run Backfoot defence to extra cover where Hopes fields well
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 1 run Short of a length and played just forward of point where Ponting fields
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run Pitched up, Pushed to Clarke at mid off
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, 2 runs Pitched on middle and leg and played through mid wicket
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run On the backfoot and played in the air to backward point. Falls short of Ponting
Bracken to McCullum, 2 runs Backfoot and steers it wide of Ponting at point
Bracken to McCullum, no run A slower ball, onto the front foot and played to Mike Hussey at mid wicket
Bracken to McCullum, no run Gets back and attempts to steer to third man, risky shot
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run gets forward and drops the ball at his feet and runs. Memories of Dean Jones there
Bracken to Guptill, no run left outside off stump
Bracken to Guptill, no run played to point
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run wide, down leg side
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 1 run pushed to mid wicket for a single
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, 1 run angled down leg side and just gets an edge to it down to backward square leg
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 2 runs forward and drives through point
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run wide outside off stump and McCullum smashes the ball straight to Ponting at point. That flew off the bat
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run Drives on the up, but straight to Hussey in the covers, just can't get it through the field
Bracken to Guptill, no run Over the wicket and the batsman is on the front foot and defending
Bracken to Guptill, no run Bracken charges in and its defended on the offside
Bracken to Guptill, 2 runs Strays on to leg stump and flicked off the pads to backward square leg. 12th man Voges fields in the deep
Bracken to Guptill, no run Over the wicket and Guptil defends on onside
Bracken to Guptill, no run Drives in the air, falls short of the mid off fieldsman
Bracken to Guptill, SIX runs Opens the shoulders and its gone miles over long on
Johnson to McCullum, no run McCullum drives into covers. Clarke does the fielding
Johnson to McCullum, no run Forward and defends to Hussey at short cover
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run guided to third man. Hilfenhaus fields
Johnson to Guptill, no run shorter ball defended down. Johnson fields
Johnson to Guptill, no run Defends into covers. Hussey fields again
Johnson to Guptill, 2 runs Puched through the covers. Hopes chases, pauses and throws but they are home
Bracken to McCullum, no run on line with the stump, giving no freedom whatsoever to McCullum to free his arms. He just manages to defend it on the off side
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run good length delivery outside the off stump. McCullum runs the ball down to third man for a single
Bracken to Guptill, no run short outside the off stump. Guptill, can't clear the field on the off side as he cuts it straight to the point fielder
Bracken to Guptill, no run fuller outside the off stump, Guptill comes forward and presents the full face of the bat
Bracken to Guptill, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, Guptill gets his bat down in an arc but can't manage to beat the fielder positioned at short cover
Bracken to Guptill, no run fuller on the leg stump, cramps Guptill up for room. Guptill, just manages to squeeze it to midwicket
Johnson to McCullum, no run outside the off stump, McCullum gets onto the backfoot and defends
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run short outside the off stump, McCullum gets onto the backfoot and allows the ball to come onto the bat as he steals a single

Johnson to Guptill, FOUR runs short on the middle stump, almost rushing onto Guptill as he looks to pull it away but does not manage to get any bat on it as the ball hits the helmet on it's way to the boundary. A Mistake there as they are awarded as runs
Johnson to Guptill, no run
Johnson to Guptill, no run outside the off stump, Guptill flashes his bat at it and is beaten
Johnson to Guptill, no run outside the off stump again. This time Guptill decides to play it closer to the body as he attempts to run it down to third man but the late swing beats him again
Hopes to McCullum, no run good length delivery outside the off stump to begin with as McCullum shuffles across and works it to midwicket
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run short outside the off stump as he sees McCullum come charging down the track. McCullum pushes it to point and sets off for a single
Hopes to Guptill, no run outside the off stump yet again as Guptill presents the full face of the bat in defense
Hopes to Guptill, 2 runs on the leg stump, Guptill works it away to long leg for a couple
Hopes to Guptill, no run outside the off stump, Guptill comes forward and defends
Hopes to Guptill, no run fuller outside the off stump. Guptill drives but can't clear trhe fielder at short cover again
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run outside the off stump, McCullum opens the face of the bat and runs the ball to cover for a single
Johnson to Guptill, no run outside the off stump, Guptill defends convincingly yet again but that is not what he should be doing
Johnson to Guptill, no run outside the off stump, Guptill opens the face of the bat to run the ball down to point
Johnson to Guptill, FOUR runs finally Guptill manages to find the gap on the off side as he thrashes an over-pitched delivery to cover boundary. Thats his first boundary on the off-side
Johnson to Guptill, 1 wide wide outside the off stump
Johnson to Guptill, no run
Johnson to Guptill, 1 run good length delivery outside the off stump. Guptill drives but gets a thick outside edge to third man for a single
Hopes to Guptill, no run fuller outside the off stump. Guptill, comes onto the frontfoot and drives it to mid-off
Hopes to Guptill, 1 run outside the off stump, Guptill pushes it to mid-on and runs across for a single
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run on the middle stump and cutting in. McCullum closes the face of the bat and pushes it to midwicket for a single. He brings up the fifty with that single
Hopes to Guptill, 1 run
Hopes to McCullum, no run outside the off stump, McCullum pushes it to point
Hopes to McCullum, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. McCullum comes charging down the track and changes his mind at the last moment as he pushes it to point
Johnson to Guptill, 2 runs good length delivery outside the off stump, Guptill, gets a thick outside edge to the right of third man for a couple
Johnson to Guptill, 1 run short on the leg stump. Guptill, stands tall and plays it down with soft hands on the leg side for a single
Johnson to McCullum, 1 leg bye short on the leg stump, McCullum looks to pull it away but is struck on the pads as he runs across for a leg-bye
Johnson to Guptill, FOUR runs fuller outside the off stump, Guptill, gets under the delivery easily as he chips it over mid-off for a boundary
Johnson to Guptill, no run short length delivery outside the off stump, Guptill plays it to cover off the backfoot
Johnson to Guptill, 1 run short on the off and middle. Guptill, gets onto the backfoot and plays it to the vacant area on the leg side to pick a single
Clarke to Guptill, no run fuller outside the off stump to begin with. Guptill pushes it back to the bowler
Clarke to Guptill, no run on the middle stump, Guptill pushes it to midwicket
Clarke to Guptill, no run arm ball on the middle stump, Guptill, plays it with soft hands back to the bowler
Clarke to Guptill, no run arm ball again. Guptill is struck on the pads this time around
Clarke to Guptill, 1 run short on the middle stump, Guptill pushes it to long-on for a single
Clarke to McCullum, no run fuller and faster on the middle stump, McCulum stands tall and pushes it back to the bowler
Johnson to Guptill, 2 runs outside the off stump. Guptill, runs it down to third man for a couple
Johnson to Guptill, FOUR runs short and wide outside the off stump, Guptill cuts it but gets a top edge that flies over the point fielder for a boundary
Johnson to Guptill, 1 run outside the off stump, pushes it to point for a single
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run good length delivery on the middle stump, McCullum jumps around in the crease and pushes it to square leg for a single

Johnson to Guptill, OUT gone! Johnson pitches one short on the middle and leg stump this time around and hurries Guptill into the stroke. He manages to get some wood on the ball as he pulls it straight into the hands of Bracken, positioned at fine-leg exactly for this
Johnson to Fulton, no run outside the off stump, Fulton moves across and defends it to the leg side
Clarke to McCullum, no run good lenght delivery on the off stump. McCullum looks to defend it but gets an inside edge to square leg
Clarke to McCullum, no run comes down the track and defends
Clarke to McCullum, no run outside the off stump, McCullum comes down the track and defends it
Clarke to McCullum, 2 runs short outside the off stump, McCullum cuts it late to deep point for a couple
Clarke to McCullum, no run fuller delivery on the middle stump, McCullum comes down the track and defends it again
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run on the leg stump, McCullum turns it to fine leg for a single
Hopes to McCullum, no run outside the off stump, McCullum comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
Hopes to McCullum, 3 runs outside the off stump and fuller too as McCullum beats Clarke at mid-off to fetch three runs for himself
Hopes to Fulton, 2 runs fuller outside the off stump, Fulton drives it wide off the bowler to long-on for a couple
Hopes to Fulton, no run outside the off stump, Fulton comes forward and pushes it to the off side
Hopes to Fulton, 1 run good length delivery on the middle stump, Fulton turns it to midwicket for a single
Hopes to McCullum, no run outside the off stump, McCullum tries to run it down but cant clear the fielder at short third man
Clarke to Fulton, 1 run outside the off stump, Fulton comes forward and pushes it to mid-off for a single
Clarke to McCullum, no run outside the off stump, McCullum pushes it to the off side
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run on the leg stump, McCullum sweeps it away to fine leg for a single
Clarke to Fulton, no run on the middle stump and an arm ball as Fulton adjusts late and defends it back onto the pitch
Clarke to Fulton, 1 run arm ball on the middle stump, Fulton drives it to cover for a single
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run drives it to cover for another single
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run good length delivery on the pads as McCullum turns it to fine-leg for a single
Hopes to Fulton, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, Fulton defends it to cover
Hopes to Fulton, no run fuller on the off stump, Fulton, looks to work it away on the leg side but gets an outside edge to short third man
Hopes to Fulton, OUT one more! Fulton falls now as he does not manage to keep the ball down as he plays an intended drive on the off side to Bracken at mid-on and Kiwis slip further now
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run fuller on the middle stump, McCullum pushes it to midwicket for a single
Hopes to Taylor, no run on the leg stump, Taylor pushes it to the short cover fielder
Clarke to McCullum, no run fuller length delivery on the middle stump, McCullum drives it back to the bowler
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run on the leg stump, McCullum moves across and sweeps it to short fine leg for a single
Clarke to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, Taylor comes forward and defends it to cover
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run on the leg stump, Taylor pushes it to long-on for a single
Clarke to McCullum, no run outside the off stump, McCullum drives it to mid-off

Clarke to McCullum, OUT timber! McCullum is beaten by the arm ball on the run. He comes down the track in an attempt to loft it away but is beaten by the arm ball pitching on the middle stump and finds his leg stump displaced. This is even more bad news as two wickets fall in two overs
Hopes to Taylor, no run on the middle and off stump line, Taylor pushes forward and defends it away towards cover
Hopes to Taylor, no run similar line and length and Taylor is happy presenting the full face of the bat and watching the ball roll away silently
Hopes to Taylor, no run bit fuller but once again the line is good, Taylor, give the situation, I guess, taps it away on the off side
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run placed wide of the fielder at cover, easy single
Hopes to Elliott, no run another harmless delivery, watchfully defended
Hopes to Elliott, no run punched off the back-foot to the point region
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run drifting onto middle and leg, Taylor waits for the ball to turn and then works it away well in front of square leg for a single
Clarke to Elliott, no run quicker delivery outside the off stump, driven straight to the man at cover
Clarke to Elliott, no run angled in from outside the off stump, defended down on the leg side
Clarke to Elliott, no run worked away off the back-foot
Clarke to Elliott, 1 run slightly short, Elliott stays back and punches it away wide of the fielder at cover
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run another easy single on the off side
Hopes to Taylor, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, Taylor lines it up but the drive finds the fielder at mid-off

Hopes to Taylor, 1 run surprise bouncer and it nearly did the trick. Taylor goes for the pull instinctively and the ball balloons up towards backward square. Hussey runs in towards his left but fails it get there on time
Hopes to Elliott, 1 run worked away on the leg side for an easy single
Hopes to Taylor, no run Hopes keeps it tight outside the off stump, defended
Hopes to Taylor, no run fuller length delivery and that's driven straight to Ponting at short cover
Hopes to Taylor, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, Taylor runs it away behind point but fails to get it past the fielder. Another good over from Hopes comes to an end
Clarke to Elliott, no run starts off with a skidder and that is played away towards midwicket
Clarke to Elliott, no run goes for the drive but not a well timed shot and the ball rolls away off the inner half of the bat
Clarke to Elliott, no run driven off the front-foot, straight to the fielder at cover
Clarke to Elliott, 1 run driven square on the off side, just enough room and they scamper through for a single
Clarke to Taylor, 2 runs short and angling in, Taylor rocks back and cuts it past the fielder at point
Clarke to Taylor, no run on the middle and off stump line, punched straight back to the fielder
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, 1 run good length outside the off stump, Elliot shuffles across and runs it down to third man for a single
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, Taylor tries to run it down to third man but gets an inside edge back onto the pitch
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, drives it back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, Taylor looks to slog it away on the leg side but gets a leading edge to cover
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 1 run
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, 2 runs short outside the off stump and Elliot cuts it to deep point for a couple
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run fuller on the leg and middle, Taylor comes down the track and pushes it to long-on for a single and it brings the hundred up
Clarke to Elliott, 1 run good length delivery on the off stump, Elliot stands tall and drives it to sweeper cover for a single
Clarke to Taylor, no run fuller on the off stump, Taylor pushes it to the leg side
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run fuller outside the off stump, Taylor pushes it to sweeper cover for a single
Clarke to Elliott, 1 run outside the off stump, Elliot square drives it to deep point for a single
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run outside the off stump, Taylor pushes it to the right of the point fielder for a single
White to Taylor, no run begins with a good leg break outside the off stump. Taylor watches it right into the gloves of Haddin
White to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, Taylor comes forward and defends it
White to Taylor, SIX runs a googly gone terribly wrong as he flights it a lot more and Taylor picks it as he knocks the leather out of the ball in sending it soaring over fine leg for a six
White to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, Taylor comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
White to Taylor, 1 run short outside the off stump, Taylor, cuts it to deep point for a single
White to Elliott, 1 run fuller on the leg stump. Invitation for Elliot to sweep and sweep he does for a single
Clarke to Elliott, no run short outside the off stump, Elliot looks to cut it away and is beaten
Clarke to Elliott, 1 run and pushes it to covers for a single
Clarke to Taylor, no run good length delivery on the off stump. Taylor drives it back to the bowler
Clarke to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, Taylor drives it back to the bowler
Clarke to Taylor, no run on the middle stump, Taylor drives it to short mid-on, where Ponting is doing the duties
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run short outside the off stump, Taylor cuts it to point for a single
White to Taylor, 1 run fuller on the off stump, Taylor drives it to long-on for a single
White to Elliott, FOUR runs fuller outside the off stump, Elliot smashes it to cover for a boundary
White to Elliott, 2 runs drives it to sweeper cover for a couple
White to Elliott, FOUR runs now he lets loose a slog sweep as he propels it to midwicket for a boundary
White to Elliott, 1 run on the leg stump, Elliot pushes it to midwicket for a single

White to Taylor, FOUR runs outside the off stump, Taylor cuts it past the point fielder and Hussey, drags it back in but not before he touches the ropes and Taylor too helps himself to a boundary. White was taken to task there as he conceded 16 runs off the over
Hopes to Elliott, 2 runs good length delivery outside the off stump, Elliot drives it wide of the long-off fielder for a couple
Hopes to Elliott, 1 run outside the off stump, Elliot runs it down to third man for a single
Hopes to Taylor, FOUR runs short outside the off stump, Taylor slog sweeps it to midwicket for a boundary and now they are revving it up
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run inside edge to deep square leg for a single
Hopes to Elliott, no run cut to point
Hopes to Elliott, no run outside the off stump, comes forward and defends it to midwicket
Johnson to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, Taylor comes forward and drives it to midwicket
Johnson to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, Taylor, is looking to drive it away on the off side but is beaten by the delivery cutting away
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run fuller delivery on the middle stump. Taylor, drives it to mid-on for a single
Johnson to Elliott, 2 runs short and wide outside the off stump. Elliot, moves across and cuts it to the left of Hilfenhaus to fetch himself a couple
Johnson to Elliott, no run Elliot shuffles across before the ball is bowled and Johnson notices it as he pitches it short on the middle and leg. Elliot lets it go

Johnson to Elliott, OUT short on the middle stump. Elliot does the pre-meditated shuffle and swats it in the gap between fine-leg and sweeper on the leg side. David Hussey, covers a lot of ground as he takes a good catch. It was more of a good catch from Hussey than a poor shot from El
Hopes to Cumming, no run outside the off stump, comes forward and defends it to point
Hopes to Cumming, no run defends it to cover point yet again
Hopes to Cumming, no run short ball outside the off stump, Cumming gets an outside edge to cover
Hopes to Cumming, no run good length outside the off stump, Cumming comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
Hopes to Cumming, no run short outside the off stump, Cumming sways out of the harm's way pretty easily

Hopes to Cumming, OUT gone! Cumming just manages to chip it to mid-off, where Johnson takes a straight-forward catch. It means Cumming has fluffed his chances in his first ODI in four years. Australia are in the driver's seat now
Johnson to Taylor, no run drives it to mid-off
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run looks to defend it on the frontfoot and gets an outside edge to third man for a single
Johnson to Broom, no run outside the off stump, Broom comes forward and pushes it to short mid-off
Johnson to Broom, no run outside the off stump. Broom shoulders arms to the delivery
Johnson to Broom, no run good length delivery on the middle stump. Broom comes forward and closes the face of the bat as he pushes it to midwicket
Johnson to Broom, no run on the middle stump, Broom, stands tall and pushes it to the leg side
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run fuller outside the off stump. Taylor drives it over a leaping Hopes for a single
Hopes to Broom, no run good length delivery on the middle stump. Broom comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
Hopes to Broom, no run outside the off stump and short in length. Broom, gets onto the backfoot and pushes it to point
Hopes to Broom, 1 run fuller in length on the middle stump. Broom, works it away to midwicket to get off the mark
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run good length delivery outside the off stump, Taylor plays it with soft hands to point and runs across for a single
Hopes to Broom, no run short outside the off stump. Broom looks to get the upper cut going but the bounce defeats the purpose
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run outside the off stump, Taylor looks to play it with soft hands but the ball rushes into him as he defends it back onto the pitch

Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 1 run short outside the off stump, Taylor cuts it to point, where Ponting does the fielding and throws the stumps down at the bowlers end. He ends up conceding a single as the ball is deflected off the stumps
Hilfenhaus to Broom, no run looks to run it down to third man but first slip does the fielding
Hilfenhaus to Broom, 1 wide high above the batsman's head and it is called a wide
Hilfenhaus to Broom, 1 run
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 2 runs full on the middle stump, Taylor works it away to deep midwicket and runs quickly for a couple
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 1 run overpitches on the leg stump.Taylor, turns it away to fine-leg for a single
Bracken to Taylor, 1 wide and begins with a wide delivery outside the off stump. He laughs it off but bet Ponting wont see the funnier side in it
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run slower delivery outside the off stump, Taylor pushes it to long-off for a single

Bracken to Broom, 1 run outside the off stump and a touch faster as Broom is beaten by the pace as he bottom edges a defensive push and runs across but not before Ponting comes running in and throws the stumps down at the bowler's end
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run

Bracken to Broom, no run outside the off stump, Broom looks to run it down to third man but gets an outside edge. Haddin, dives across and takes the ball brilliantly and top it off he does a backhand flick too
Bracken to Broom, no run pushes it to point
Bracken to Broom, 1 run short outside the off stump.Broom cuts it to deep point for a single
Hilfenhaus to Broom, no run short outside the off stump. Broom, stands tall and looks to pull it away - his first attacking stroke- and is beaten
Hilfenhaus to Broom, 1 run good length delivery on the middle stump. Broom pushes it on the leg side and runs across for a single
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run fuller on the middle stump. Taylor, comes forward and gets his bat down in time to defend the ball back onto the pitch
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run fuller on the off stump, Taylor, drives it back to the bowler

Hilfenhaus to Taylor, SIX runs short on the middle stump. Taylor, spots it early and lets go of the pull shot and clears the deep square leg fielder easily as he sends the ball five rows into the crowd
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run fuller on the middle stump. Taylor, pushes it back to the bowler
Bracken to Broom, 1 run outside the off stump, Broom pushes it to cover and runs across for a quick single
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run good length delivery outside the off stump. Taylor, drives but does not time it as he runs across for a single
Bracken to Broom, no run on the middle stump, Broom pushes it to midwicket
Bracken to Broom, no run outside the off stump. Broom looks to play it with soft hands but is unable to as the ball goes to cover
Bracken to Broom, 1 run outside the off stump and on a good length. Broom drives it to long-off for a single
Bracken to Taylor, 2 runs good length delivery outside the off stump. Taylor walks across and drives it to the right of sweeper cover for a couple
Hilfenhaus to Broom, no run on the middle stump. Broom moves across and pushes it to midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Broom, no run outside the off stump and left alone
Hilfenhaus to Broom, 1 wide short and wide down the leg side and rightly called so
Hilfenhaus to Broom, FOUR runs fuller on the middle stump. Broom, brings the bat down to jam the ball down as he gets a thick inside edge to the fine-leg boundary

Hilfenhaus to Broom, OUT it's all over for Broom. Hilfenhaus, pitches it short and Broom, spontaneously goes for the pull and ends up top edging it to Hopes, stationed at cover. Just when it looked like a partnership was coming on, a wicket falls
Hilfenhaus to Mills, no run and has to face the chin music first up
Hilfenhaus to Mills, no run fuller length delivery on the middle stump. Mills defends it off the backfoot
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run on the leg stump. Taylor turns it away to fine-leg for a single
Johnson to Mills, no run outside the off stump and coming in. Mills defends it of the backfoot
Johnson to Mills, 1 run outside the off stump. Mills runs it down to third man for a single

Johnson to Taylor, 1 run ! Taylor looks to work it away on the leg side but is early into the shot as he gets a leading edge to a diving Ponting, who gets his left hand to the ball but can't take the catch. Taylor gets a single and moves on to his half-century
Johnson to Mills, no run outside the off stump, Mills defends it back onto the pitch
Johnson to Mills, no run a repeat of the defensive stroke from the last ball
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, FOUR runs short outside the off stump. Hilfenhaus, sledge-hammers it to sweeper cover for a boundary
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 1 run on the leg stump. Taylor works it away on the leg side for a single
Hilfenhaus to Mills, no run outside the off stump, Mills, comes forward and defends it
Hilfenhaus to Mills, no run short outside the off stump. Mills looks to cut it away but draws his bat back in and lets it pass
Hilfenhaus to Mills, no run short on the middle stump. Mills, this time ducks under it
Hilfenhaus to Mills, 1 run fuller outside the off stump, Mills, pushes it to mid-off and sets off for a quick single
Bracken to Taylor, 2 runs fuller outside the off stump. Taylor, comes down the track and chips it to the left of the fielder at long-off for a couple
Bracken to Taylor, no run outside the off stump and cutting away. Taylor, is looking to go for the slog-sweep but the ball cutting away beats the purpose
Bracken to Taylor, 2 runs fuller outside the off stump, Taylor leans across and flat-bats it to midwicket for a couple
Bracken to Taylor, FOUR runs full-toss outside the off stump. Taylor, moves across and slogs it to cow corner for a boundary
Bracken to Taylor, 5 wide wide, far too wide outside the off stump. And what adds to Bracken's misery is the fine-leg fielder being inside the circle . He ends up conceding five wides
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run on the leg stump. Bracken turns it away to fine-leg for a single
Bracken to Mills, 1 run on the leg stump, Mills pushes it to midwicket for a single
Johnson to Mills, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Mills is looking to go downtown but is beaten by the away movement
Johnson to Mills, no run on the leg stump. Mills is moving away once again and Johnson follows him as Mills pushes it back to the bowler
Johnson to Mills, SIX runs up, up and away! Mills backs away to the short delivery and it had six written all over it from the moment it left the bat. The ball is sent onto the roof-top at fine-leg
Johnson to Mills, 1 leg bye on the leg stump, Mills looks to work it away but is struck on the pads. Nevertheless, he runs across for a leg-bye

Johnson to Taylor, OUT gone! Full-toss on the off stump. Taylor, moves across and looks to get cheeky as he wants to paddle it to fine-leg but the ball comes in faster than he expects. Taylor, manages to get a top edge which flies high. Haddin is calling for it right from the moment it
Johnson to Mills, 1 run slower delivery outside the off stump. Mills pushes it to mid-off for a quick single
Johnson to Mills, 2 runs and Mills enjoys the freedom as he cuts it away to third man for a couple
Johnson to Mills, no run short on the middle stump. Mills, hops around and defends it back onto the pitch
Johnson to Mills, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Mills, looks to heave it away to long-on but is quick into the shot as he is beaten
Johnson to Mills, 1 run fuller outside the off stump. Only good fielding by Clarke at mid-off denies Mills a boundary as he has to be happy with a single for now
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run fuller outside the off stump. Taylor, lets go off the drive and sees David Hussey, bring off a full-length dive to stop a boundary
Johnson to Mills, 2 runs short delivery on the middle stump and forces Mills into the pull stroke. The top-edged pull just falls short of a diving Hilfenhaus and they run across for a couple
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 1 wide wide outside the off stump to begin the over
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run fuller outside the off stump. Taylor drives it extra-cover, who is standing on the edge of the circle
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, FOUR runs this time Taylor splits the gap between cover and extra-cover as he helps himself for a boundary
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, FOUR runs now he goes inside-out and lofts it over the infield for another boundary
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 3 runs fuller on the leg stump. Taylor, beats the short fine-leg fielder- Bracken - and gets three runs for his efforts
Hilfenhaus to Mills, FOUR runs short on the middle stump. Mills moves away and lets go with a cut shot. A boundary is the result
Hilfenhaus to Mills, no run Mills looks to repeat the dose but moves away a little bit more this time. Hilfenhaus follows him and beats the attempted cut shot
Bracken to Mills, 2 runs fuller on the off stump. Mills moves away and drives it to long-off for a couple
Bracken to Mills, 1 run on the leg stump, Mills pushes it to midwicket for a single
Bracken to Vettori, 1 run short on the leg stump. Vettori, the new batsman pulls it to square leg for a single
Bracken to Mills, 1 run fuller on the middle stump. Mills, chips it to deep midwicket for a single
Bracken to Vettori, 3 runs full-toss angled onto the pads. Vettori, guides it to deep square leg for three runs

Bracken to Mills, OUT timber! Mills is backing away even before the ball is bowled. Bracken notices it and bowls a yorker on the middle stump. Mills has a swing and there is only place where the ball can go- stumps- if he misses and it does go there
Hopes to Vettori, 1 run drifts onto the pads as Vettori pushes it to midwicket for a single
Hopes to Southee, 1 run full-toss on the middle stump. Southee, moves across and slogs it to deep midwicket for a single
Hopes to Vettori, 1 run outside the off stump, Vettori guides it to third man for a single
Hopes to Southee, 2 runs yorker on the off stump. Southee jams it to long-on and runs across for a quick couple
Hopes to Southee, 2 runs yorker on the middle stump, Southee pushes it to deep square leg for a couple
Hopes to Southee, 2 runs fuller on the leg stump. Southee, comes down the track and plays it to deep midwicket and takes the couple
It will all depend on the start that the Australian top-order can get. Join us in about thirty-five minutes for the start of the Australian innings

New Zealand end up with a competitive score of 244. Australia, looked like restricting them to a total much lesser than that, especially when Clarke was bowling but Taylor's batting in the final 10 overs ensured that the effect was neutralized.
Welcome back to the Australian chase. We will have the successful opening pair of Sydney back today. It will be Mills to start off
Mills to Haddin, 1 run Mills bowls a fuller delivery and Haddin looks to work it away on the leg side. Haddin gets a leading edge and gets the scorecard moving
Mills to Clarke, 2 runs outside the off stump, Clarke, gets to the pitch of the delivery and drives it to sweeper cover for a couple
Mills to Clarke, 1 run fuller on the middle stump, Clarke, works it away to deep square leg for a single
Mills to Haddin, 1 run bowls on the pads once again as Haddin works it away to deep square leg for a single
Mills to Clarke, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Clarke, gets his foot to the pitch of the delivery and lets it pass to the keeper
Mills to Clarke, no run outside the off stump. Clarke, once again gets to the pitch of the delivery and shoulders arms
Southee to Haddin, no run outside the off stump and Haddin is not interested
Southee to Haddin, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Haddin, moves across and pushes the delivery to cover
Southee to Haddin, 1 wide wide down the leg side
Southee to Haddin, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, devoid of any movement. Haddin gets behind the line of the delivery and lets it pass to the keeper
Southee to Haddin, FOUR runs thats the Haddin we got to know from Sydney as he moves away a touch and smashes a short length delivery in the gap between cover and point for a boundary
Southee to Haddin, no run outside the off stump. Haddin, gets solidly behind the line of the delivery and defends it
Southee to Haddin, no run fuller on the off stump. Haddin, does not connect with the intended drive as it just falls short of Elliot at mid-on
Mills to Clarke, no run good length delivery on the off stump. Clarke, leans across and pushes it to mid-on
Mills to Clarke, no run short outside the off stump. Clarke, stands tall and pushes it to cover
Mills to Clarke, no run short outside the off stump. Clarke, is looking to play it with soft hands but gets an inside edge back onto the pitch
Mills to Clarke, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, Clarke drives it to mid-off
Mills to Clarke, no run fuller length delivery outside the off stump. Clarke, drives but good fielding by Fulton at short cover prevents not only a boundary but a run too
Mills to Clarke, 1 run full delivery on the off stump, Clarke, drives it to the right of mid-off fielder for a single
Southee to Clarke, 3 runs sheer timing there as Southee, bowls a full delivery outside the off stump. Clarke drives it past Southee, who does well to get some hand onto it and prevents an extra run
Southee to Haddin, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Haddin, gets behind the line of the delivery and defends
Southee to Haddin, no run outside the off stump and short in length. Haddin looks to cut it away and gets a bottom edge back to the keeper
Southee to Haddin, FOUR runs rank bad ball as Haddin gets behind the short delivery easily and pulls it away to deep square-leg for a boundary
Southee to Haddin, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Haddin, comes forward and pushes it to cover
Southee to Haddin, FOUR runs bad bowling again by Southee as he pitches it short and Haddin, is happy to pull it away to deep square leg for another boundary
Mills to Clarke, FOUR runs fuller on the off stump. Clarke, does amazingly well to move his frontfoot across and chips it over the infield on the leg-side for a boundary. Top shot that
Mills to Clarke, no run short outside the off stump. Clarke, drives it to cover off the backfoot
Mills to Clarke, no run short outside the off stump, Clarke, is putting the cover fielder under severe test as he cuts it to him and the fielder does pass the test
Mills to Clarke, 1 run off the inside edge onto the pads as they run across for a single
Mills to Haddin, no run outside the off stump and short in length. Haddin, gets behind the line of the delivery and defends it
Mills to Haddin, no run outside the off stump. Haddin, comes forward and drives it to mid-off
O'Brien to Clarke, 2 runs and immediately has a sniff at wicket as he manages to entice Clarke into playing a drive which just manages to beat the outstretched fingers of Elliot at mid-on
O'Brien to Clarke, no run defends on the frontfoot
O'Brien to Clarke, no run outside the off stump, defends on the backfoot
O'Brien to Ponting, no run outside the off stump, Ponting, comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
O'Brien to Ponting, no run on the pads. Ponting, looks to work it away and is rapped on the pads
Mills to Haddin, no run outside the off stump and on a good length. Haddin, gets behind the line of the delivery and defends it
Mills to Haddin, no run fuller in length outside the off stump. Haddin, comes forward and drives it to mid-off
Mills to Haddin, no run good length delivery on the middle stump. Haddin, pushes it to the leg-side off the backfoot
Mills to Haddin, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Haddin treats it with utmost respect as he defends on the frontfoot
Mills to Haddin, no run outside the off stump, Haddin, gets behind the line of the delivery and defends it
Mills to Haddin, no run outside the off stump, Haddin, pushes it to point
O'Brien to Ponting, no run
O'Brien to Ponting, no run bowls it full and straight on the off stump, he
O'Brien to Ponting, 1 run just opens the face of the bat and steers this one wide of gully
O'Brien to Haddin, no run just holds the length back a bit, he gets across on the backfoot and defends
O'Brien to Haddin, no run sticks to the same line and length and he defends solidly on the backfoot again
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run this time he defends with an angled bat and steers it down the vacant backward point region

Mills to Haddin, no run good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Haddin makes room and looks to go inside-out through extra cover but the shot is not timed well enough and the ball rolls down to mid-on
Mills to Haddin, no run punched away on the off side
Mills to Haddin, 1 run quicker delivery, Haddin goes hard at it and the ball races away to third man, more edge than middle

Mills to Ponting, no run that's plumb but not given. Good length delivery, pitched outside the off stump and this one jagged back in. Ponting pushes forward to drive and is beaten by the angle. Looked out but umpire Davis was not impressed.
Mills to Ponting, no run wide outside the off stump and Ponting is beaten on the drive
Mills to Ponting, no run this one came back in but is wide outside the off stump
O'Brien to Haddin, no run line and length delivery outside the off stump, worked away towards cover
O'Brien to Haddin, FOUR runs take that! short and wide outside the off stump, Haddin quickly gets into position and slams it past the fielder at point

O'Brien to Haddin, FOUR runs four more. This one is pitched up and O'Brien finds out why that is not the length to bowl. Haddin gets right behind the line and hammers it straight back down the ground long-on fence
O'Brien to Haddin, no run follows it up with a good yorker and Haddin defends it watchfully
O'Brien to Haddin, no run pushed away on the off side, no room for a single there
O'Brien to Haddin, no run good length delivery and this one kept bit low. Haddin reads it well and taps it away on the off side
Mills to Ponting, no run short and wide outside the off stump, cut straight to the fielder at point. Missed out there on an easy boundary
Mills to Ponting, no run good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, this one kept going straight after hitting the deck and Ponting has no problems defending it down the track
Mills to Ponting, 1 wide wayward delivery down the leg side

Mills to Ponting, no run short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Ponting stands tall on the back-foot and punches it hard toward cover and a full length diving stop there from Broom cuts for a certain boundary
Mills to Ponting, no run forced away off the back-foot to covers
Mills to Ponting, 1 run pushed towards extra cover and Ponting takes on Guptill there, direct hit at the bowler's end would have been interesting
Mills to Haddin, no run good length and rising, Haddin stands tall and defends it down
O'Brien to Ponting, no run line and length delivery, Ponting walks across as usual and defends it back to the bowler
O'Brien to Ponting, 1 run driven through the gap between point and cover. width was on offer and Ponting nicely opened the face to get the placement right
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run good length delivery, pitched outside the off stump and cutting in. Haddin punches it off the back-foot to mid-off and they scamper through for a well judged single.
O'Brien to Ponting, no run worked away with no real intention
O'Brien to Ponting, FOUR runs good length delivery, Ponting steps forward and across and creams it through the gap between the cover fielders
O'Brien to Ponting, no run pushed back to the bowler
Mills to Haddin, no run outside the off stump, comes forward and defends it to the off side
Mills to Haddin, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Haddin, comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
Mills to Haddin, 1 run outside the off stump, Haddin, pushes it to mid-on for a single
Mills to Ponting, 1 run on the leg stump, Ponting, pushes it to fine leg for a single
Mills to Haddin, no run outside the off stump. Haddin, gets onto the frontfoot and defends it to cover

O'Brien to Ponting, FOUR runs fuller delivery outside the off stump and how much more lucky can Ponting get? He drives and finds that the outside edge flies past the place, exactly where the first slip would have been and to top it all off he gets a boundary
O'Brien to Ponting, no run comes forward and defends
O'Brien to Ponting, 1 run
O'Brien to Haddin, no run comes down the track and pushes it to point
O'Brien to Haddin, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Haddin, pushes it to point off the backfoot
O'Brien to Haddin, no run fuller length delivery outside the off stump. Haddin, comes forward and drives it to mid-off
Southee to Ponting, no run outside the off stump, comes forward and defends
Southee to Ponting, no run width outside the off stump, Ponting, drives it straight to the point fielder
Southee to Ponting, 2 runs good length outside the off stump. Ponting cuts it to third man and ambles across for a couple
Southee to Ponting, no run full outside the off stump, Ponting, drives it to mid-off

Southee to Ponting, OUT and for the umpteenth time this summer we see Ponting top-edging a pull shot. Only difference this time being he does it to the cover fielder as Guptill takes it comfortably. Ever heard of a strength turning into a weakness
Southee to Hussey, no run outside the off stump. Hussey, comes forward and pushes it to mid-on
O'Brien to Haddin, no run outside the off stump and coming in. Haddin, gets behind the line of the delivery and defends it. The dismissal of Ponting will certainly stifle him
O'Brien to Haddin, no run outside the off stump. Haddin, stands tall and cuts it to point
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run outside the off stump, Haddin, runs it down to third man for a single
O'Brien to Hussey, no run outside the off stump and left all alone
O'Brien to Hussey, FOUR runs take that! Hussey pulls the short ball with some power to the deep midwicket fence and gets a boundary for his efforts
O'Brien to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Hussey, drives it to mid-off
Southee to Haddin, no run outside the off stump, Haddin, lets it go to the keeper
Southee to Haddin, 2 runs outside the off stump and short in length. A terrible misfield by Broom allows Haddin to take an extra run
Southee to Haddin, (no ball) 1 run oversteps and bowls one on the leg stump. Haddin, pushes it to leg side for a single
Southee to Hussey, 2 runs fuller outside the off stump, Hussey, drives it straight down the ground for a couple
Southee to Hussey, 2 runs outside the off stump, Hussey looks to cut it away and it misses the stumps by a whisker as he gets an inside edge
Southee to Hussey, no run
Southee to Hussey, no run short outside the off stump. Hussey, looks to cut it away and is beaten
Vettori to Haddin, no run top ball! beats Haddin with the drift and we should enjoy the contest from now on
Vettori to Haddin, no run outside the off stump, Haddin, comes forward and pushes it to the off side
Vettori to Haddin, 2 runs short outside the off stump, Haddin, cuts it off the keepers gloves to third man for a couple
Vettori to Haddin, SIX runs fuller on the off stump. Haddin, slog sweeps it and the ball lands bang on the boundary rope. Vettori needs to settle down into restrictive line now
Vettori to Haddin, no run outside off, Haddin, comes forward and defends it
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run fuller outside the off stump, Haddin, comes forward and plays it with soft hands to cover for a single
Southee to Haddin, 1 run short outside the off stump. Haddin, cuts it to third man for a single
Southee to Hussey, no run outside the off stump and left alone
Southee to Hussey, 2 runs short outside the off stump, Hussey gets onto the backfoot and pulls it to deep midwicket for a couple
Southee to Hussey, 2 runs short and wide outside the off stump. Hussey, cuts it past a diving point fielder to sweeper cover for a couple
Southee to Hussey, no run fuller and slower outside the off stump. Hussey, comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
Southee to Hussey, 1 run on the leg stump, Hussey, turns it to deep midwicket for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run fuller on the middle stump, Hussey, drives it back to the bowler
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Hussey, comes forward and defends
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Hussey, comes forward and inside-edges an intended drive back onto the pitch
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Hussey comes forward and pushes it to cover
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the off stump, Hussey, takes the frontfoot out of the way and drives it to mid-off for a single
Vettori to Haddin, no run on the pads, Haddin, looks to play it away on the leg side but gets rapped on the pads
Southee to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Hussey, slices it to mid-off and refuses a call for a single
Southee to Hussey, FOUR runs short outside the off stump. Hussey, makes room for himself and cuts it past the diving point fielder for a boundary. Poor line from Southee once again
Southee to Hussey, no run fuller outside the off stump, Hussey, drives it back to the bowler
Southee to Hussey, 1 run full on the middle and leg. Hussey, whips it to midwicket for a single
Southee to Haddin, no run fuller in length outside the off stump. Haddin, comes down the track and drives it to cover
Southee to Haddin, no run fuller on the off stump. Haddin, mistimes the drive as it falls well short of the fielder at mid-on
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run on the middle stump, Haddin, comes down the ground and chips it to deep midwicket for a single
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the middle stump, Hussey, pushes it to midwicket for a single
Vettori to Haddin, no run good length outside the off stump. Haddin, drives it to cover
Vettori to Haddin, no run good length on the middle stump. Haddin, pushes it to mid-on
Vettori to Haddin, no run fuller length delivery on the off stump. Hadin, comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
Elliott to Hussey, no run short outside the off stump. Hussey, lets it pass to the keeper
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run short outside the off stump. Hussey, cuts it to deep point for a single
Elliott to Haddin, no run short outside the off stump. Haddin, comes down the track and looks to cut it away but is, beaten
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run fuller on the leg stump, Haddin, pushes it to midwicket for a single
Elliott to Hussey, no run on the leg stump. Hussey, pushes it to midwicket
Elliott to Hussey, 1 leg bye off the pads to midwicket for a leg-bye
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run on the off stump, Hussey, gets onto the backfoot and whips it to deep square leg for a single
Vettori to Haddin, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, Haddin, comes forward and defends it
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run short outside the off stump. Haddin, cuts it to deep point for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run fuller outside the off stump. Hussey comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
Vettori to Hussey, no run short outside the off stump, Hussey, cuts it to cover
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the middle stump, Hussey, pushes it to midwicket for a single
Elliott to Hussey, no run outside the off stump and left alone
Elliott to Hussey, no run slower delivery on the middle stump. Hussey, inside edges it onto his pads

Elliott to Hussey, 1 run, OUT short outside the off stump. Hussey, cuts it to deep point and Haddin, wants a couple. Hussey, initially responds and shouts a loud no as Haddin is on the run. Haddin has to run back and he is not quick enough to beat Cumming's throw. Kiwis are right on to
Elliott to Hussey, no run comes forward and defends
Elliott to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Michael, comes forward and pushes it to cover
Elliott to Hussey, no run outside the off stump and short in length. Michael, cuts it to point
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run short outside the off stump. David, cuts it to deep point for a single
Vettori to Hussey, FOUR runs fuller outside the off stump. Michael gets going with a square drive and gets a boundary for his efforts
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run outside the off stump, Michael, comes forward and pushes it to the off-side for a single
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run fuller outside the off stump, David, drives it to long-off for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run on the good length outside the off stump. Michael, is looking to defend it but gets an outside edge to short third man
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Michael, comes forward and defends it to cover
Elliott to Hussey, no run short delivery outside the off stump. David, shoulders arms to the delivery
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the leg stump, David, turns it to deep square leg for a single
Elliott to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Michael, drives it back to the bowler
Elliott to Hussey, no run on the leg stump, Michael, plays it away on the leg side
Elliott to Hussey, 1 wide short and it sails over the head of Michael comfortably and is called a wide
Elliott to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, comes forward and plays it to the off-side with soft hands
Elliott to Hussey, no run
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run
Vettori to Hussey, 2 runs dropped! Guptill does exceptionally well to reach to the pull shot by Michael but does not hold onto the delivery
Vettori to Hussey, no run left alone outside the off stump
Vettori to Hussey, no run
Vettori to Hussey, SIX runs short on the off stump. Michael rocks back and pulls it away over midwicket for a six
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Michael comes forward and defends
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run outside the off stump. David comes forward and drives it to cover
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run short and wide outside the off stump. Michael cuts it but a good team work by the fielders at point and backward point prevents anything more a single
Elliott to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, David comes forward and defends it
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run outside the off stump. David pushes it to cover and sets off for a single
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run outside the off stump. David drives it to sweeper cover for another single to retain the strike
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the off stump, David comes forward and pushes it to long-on for a single
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run good length delivery on the leg stump. Michael, pushes it to midwicket for a single
Vettori to Hussey, 2 runs fuller on the leg stump, David sweeps it to fine-leg for a couple
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside the off stump. David, comes forward and pushes it to cover
Vettori to Hussey, no run fuller length delivery outside the off stump, David, drives it to cover
Vettori to Hussey, 2 runs fuller on the middle and leg. David, turns it to the right of fine-leg for a couple
O'Brien to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, Michael, comes forward and defends
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run on the leg stump, Michael turns it away to fine-leg for a single
O'Brien to Hussey, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, David swings and misses
O'Brien to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, David comes forward and drives it to cover
O'Brien to Hussey, no run outside the off stump and short in length. David lets it go to the keeper
O'Brien to Hussey, no run short outside the off stump, David cuts it to point, who does well to stop it
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run good length delivery drifting onto the pads. Michael pushes it to mid-on and runs across for a single
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run on the leg stump and short in length. David, pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run outside the off stump. Michael, pushes it wide of the point fielder for a single
Elliott to Hussey, no run short on the off stump. David comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
Elliott to Hussey, no run defends on the frontfoot yet again
Elliott to Hussey, 2 runs fuller on the middle stump. David turns it to the left of fine-leg and is quick enough to come back for a couple
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run short outside the off stump. Michael allows the ball to come onto the bat as he runs it down to third man for a single
O'Brien to Hussey, no run short and 136 kmph. David comfortably ducks under it
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run short outside the off stump. David, cuts it to deep point for a single
O'Brien to Hussey, FOUR runs short outside the off stump. Invitation enough for Michael to rock back and pull it away past a sloppy mid-on fielder for a boundary
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the leg stump, Michael turns it to fine-leg for a single
O'Brien to Hussey, no run full outside the off stump. David drives it straight to the cover fielder
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run good length delivery outside the off stump and the left-handed Hussey punches it down to long-off for an easy single
Elliott to Hussey, no run punched away by the right handed Hussey to the mid-off region, no room for a single there
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run slower delivery on the middle and leg stump line, D Hussey leans forward and plays it down to long-off for a single
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run short and that's pulled away to deep backward square leg for a single
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run lofted down to long-on, 98 off 97 now.

Elliott to Hussey, 2 runs bowled from round the stumps and angled into the left-hander. Hussey stays back and clips it down to fine leg for a brace. No problems with running between the wickets there, poetic
Mills to Hussey, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of away movement ? could be just me. David Hussey leaves it through to the keeper
Mills to Hussey, no run fuller length delivery and that's played down to mid-on

Mills to Hussey, no run good length delivery, not much width and the ball was angled into the right-hander. Hussey gets behind the line and drives it down to mid-off but fails to get it past the fielder there
Mills to Hussey, no run nice little leg cutter and Hussey finds the man at cover. That is four dot balls in a row
Mills to Hussey, no run make that five, another line and length delivery - no width offered and David drives it straight back to the bowler
Mills to Hussey, no run maiden! short and wide outside the off stump and David cuts it straight to the fielder at point. End of an excellent over
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run worked away with the spin to the square leg region
Vettori to Hussey, 2 runs punched off the back-foot to deep point and that brings up the 50 partnership
Vettori to Hussey, no run full and on the pads, Hussey finds the man at mid-on
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run driven wide of the cover fielder
Vettori to Hussey, no run quicker delivery outside the off stump and that is left through to the keeper
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run pulled away to deep midwicket, easy single to end the over

Mills to Hussey, FOUR runs good length delivery outside the off stump, Mike Hussey leans forward and slices it past the diving fielder at backward point. Excellent timing and the placement was spot on
Mills to Hussey, no run worked away in front of point
Mills to Hussey, 2 runs width offered outside the off stump and that's driven to deep cover for a single. Fielder in the deep moved across quickly and cut off the second run
Mills to Hussey, 1 run driven of the back-foot to the point region, bit of a misfield and they scamper through for a single
Mills to Hussey, 1 run worked away wide of the man at midwicket and yet another easy single is added to the total. That's the way to go - keep it simple for now and wait for the PowerPlay
Mills to Hussey, no run played to mid-on
Vettori to Hussey, no run tosses it up a little more and David works it, just falling short of the fielder at midwicket
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run outside the off stump, David comes forward and drives it to mid-off for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run comes forward and drives it to cover
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run short outside the off stump, Michael drives it to sweeper cover for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, David comes forward and defends it
Vettori to Hussey, FOUR runs David goes inside out as he lofts it over extra-cover for a boundary and he also gets to his half-century with that shot
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run good length delivery outside the off stump. Michael turns it away to midwicket and runs across for a single
Elliott to Hussey, no run good length delivery on the off stump. David tries to emulate what Michael did but can't beat the fielder at mid-on
Elliott to Hussey, 3 runs good length delivery on the middle stump. David whips it to fine-leg for three runs
Elliott to Hussey, no run short on the middle stump. Michael, ducks under it
Elliott to Hussey, FOUR runs short outside the off stump. Michael, pulls it to deep midwicket where Cumming is probably unsighted and drops the catch. To add to the pain he concedes a boundary
Elliott to Hussey, 3 wide wide outside the off stump and McCullum fumbles with it,conceding three byes
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run pushes it to deep point for a single
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the off stump, Michael pushes it to deep square leg for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, David comes forward and defends
Vettori to Hussey, 2 runs fuller on the middle stump. David turns it away to fine-leg for a couple
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside the off stump. David, looks to turn it away but gets an inside edge back onto the pitch
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run outside the off stump, drives it to long off for a single
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the leg stump, Michael, drives it to long-on for a single
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run short outside the off stump. Michael pulls it with a flat bat to deep midwicket for a single
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run good length delivery outside the off stump. David, runs it down to third man for a single
Elliott to Hussey, no run fuller on the middle stump. Michael, drives it straight to mid-on fielder
Elliott to Hussey, no run on the leg stump, Michael pushes it to mid-on again
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run fuller outside the off stump. Michael, comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single
Elliott to Hussey, 2 runs on the leg stump. David turns it to the right of fine-leg for a couple
Southee to Hussey, 2 runs fuller outside the off stump. Michael drives it to deep extra cover for a couple. What's more he gets to his half-century with that shot
Southee to Hussey, 1 run fuller outside the off stump, Michael drives it to extra cover for a single
Southee to Hussey, 1 run fuller length delivery on the off stump. David drives it to long-on for a single
Southee to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, comes forward and defends
Southee to Hussey, no run outside the off stump. Michael, looks to cut it away but is beaten
Southee to Hussey, no run fuller length delivery outside the off stump. Michael, drives it to cover
O'Brien to Hussey, FOUR runs full outside the off stump. David opens the face of the bat at the last moment to run it down to third man for a boundary
O'Brien to Hussey, no run outside the off stump and fuller in length. David, drives it to mid-off
O'Brien to Hussey, FOUR runs fuller in length outside the off stump. David chips it over mid-off for a boundary and now they are getting a tab on the proceedings
O'Brien to Hussey, no run
O'Brien to Hussey, 3 runs fuller outside the off stump. David chips it over the infield on the off-side field for three runs
O'Brien to Hussey, 2 runs fuller on the leg stump. Michael, turns it to fine-leg and comes back for a well-run couple
Southee to Hussey, FOUR runs fuller outside the off stump. David moves away and smashes it past the extra cover fielder for a boundary
Southee to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the leg stump. David drives it to mid-on and sets off for a quick single
Southee to Hussey, 1 run Michael comes down the track in a pre-meditated mode.Southee, bangs it short and he pulls it away to midwicket for a single
Southee to Hussey, no run
Southee to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the leg stump. Right-handed Hussey pushes it to mid-on for a single
Southee to Hussey, 1 run outside the off stump. Hussey comes onto the frontfoot and drives it to long-off for a single
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run fuller outside the off stump. Michael drives it to deep extra cover for a single
O'Brien to Ferguson, 1 run outside the off stump. Ferguson drives it to sweeper cover for a single and gets off the mark
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run full-toss on the off stump. Hussey drives it to long-off for a single

O'Brien to Ferguson, 1 run good length delivery outside the off stump. Ferguson pushes it to cover and sets off for a quick single. Umpire Davis wants to refer the decision to third umpire even though Ferguson is well in
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run short delivery on the leg stump. Hussey, pushes it to the leg side and runs across for a quick single
Southee to Hussey, 1 run outside the off stump. Hussey, drives it to extra cover for a single
Southee to Ferguson, no run good length delivery outside the off stump. Ferguson looks to cut it away but is beaten by the cut
Southee to Ferguson, 1 run short outside the off stump. Ferguson gets the cut shot right and gets a single
Southee to Hussey, 3 runs full-toss on the leg stump. Hussey turns it away to fine-leg for three runs
Southee to Ferguson, 1 run short outside the off stump. Ferguson cuts it to sweeper cover for a single
Southee to Hussey, 1 run fuller on the leg stump. Hussey pushes it to Vettori at mid-on and sets off for a quick single. It was made possible by the fact that Vettori fumbled
Elliott to Hussey, 2 runs full-toss on the off stump. Hussey, pushes it to the left of long-on fielder and runs across for a couple
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run on the middle stump. Hussey, pushes it to deep midwicket for a single
Elliott to Ferguson, no run outside the off stump. Ferguson is hit on the back leg and that would have gone onto hit the stumps. Umpire Davis does not want to give it
Elliott to Ferguson, 1 run fuller on the off stump. Ferguson, pushes it to midwicket for a single
Elliott to Hussey, 1 run fuller outside the off stump. Hussey, drives it to mid-off for a single

Elliott to Ferguson, FOUR runs fuller outside the off stump. Ferguson, drives it past the diving mid-off fielder for a boundary. No justice left in the world as Ferguson was plumb in front three deliveries back
Southee to Hussey, no run outside off, Hussey comes forward and defends
Southee to Hussey, no run fuller on the leg stump. Hussey, pushes it to midwicket
Southee to Hussey, 1 run fuller outside the off stump. Hussey, drives it to mid-off for a single
Southee to Ferguson, no run short outside the off stump. Ferguson looks to pull it away but gets a leading edge to mid-off
Southee to Ferguson, no run full outside the off stump. Ferguson's bat hits the ground and the fielders go up in appeal but these can't be given
Southee to Ferguson, FOUR runs fuller on the middle stump. Ferguson, elegantly flicks it to deep midwicket for a boundary
Mills to Hussey, no run fuller on the off stump. Hussey, drives it to mid-on
Mills to Hussey, SIX runs full toss on the off stump. Hussey, lofts it high over mid-on and it bounces on the ropes. Thus Hussey finishes the match off in style
Join us on Friday for the decider in Brisbane. Till then, good night from all of us at Cricinfo
David Hussey is the Man of the match and he admits he was nervous after the Haddin dismissal. He is thankful that his brother calmed the nerves and allowed him a free hand.
Ponting is happy that his bowlers did a good job in restricting the Kiwi batsmen bar the batting Powerplay and is pretty appreciative of Michael Hussey and Michael Clarke.
Michael Hussey compliments Ferguson for his coolness under pressure and also compliments his brother on his good knock.

After the dismissal of Haddin, it seemed that the Kiwis had the upper hand but the partnership between the Hussey brothers dashed all the hopes of a victory and it will be all down to the final match in Brisbane on Friday. Hold on for a few minutes for the presentation
Hussey brothers make sure that the series goes to Brisbane with everything to play for. They were helped in good part by Haddin too
Australia won by 6 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)
Player of the match is David Hussey, AUS
